channel.title: afwall on Home
channel.description: Recent content in afwall on Home

item.title: Fix an issue with incorrectly transferred files via GSConnect
item.description: I’ve recently flashed LingeageOS 18.1 onto my phone. After rooting it, I’ve installed my fav firewall app AFWall+ . But since then I was having problems with sending files to my pc or other phones via (GSConnect app)[https://github.com/GSConnect/gnome-shell-extension-gsconnect]. All sent files had different size than the original file on my phone. I’ve described it in this bug report comment . After a bit of reading I realised that I have to add some extra iptables rules described in GSConnect&rsquo;s Wiki ,
